recipe.ingredients: - unsweetened almond milk: 1 cup - frozen mixed berries: 1 cup - spinach: 1 cup - chia seeds: 1 tablespoon - protein powder (vanilla or unflavored): 1 scoop - ground flaxseed: 1 tablespoon - cinnamon: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Gather all ingredients and ensure the berries are frozen to give the smoothie a thick consistency. 2. Blend the Smoothie: In a blender, combine unsweetened almond milk, frozen mixed berries, spinach, chia seeds, protein powder, ground flaxseed, and cinnamon. 3. Mix Until Smooth: Blend on high for about 1-2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth. 4. Check Consistency: If the smoothie is too thick, add a little more almond milk and blend again. 5. Serve Immediately: Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy fresh for the best flavor and nutrients.
